parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Changes the rainbow value smoothly during the given time (in seconds). A time of zero means there will be an immediate change.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> time '''setRainbow''' value

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> time: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>360 [[setRainbow]] 1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[rainbow]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 24, 2015 - 00:32 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Benargee|Benargee]]</dt>
<dd class="note">It should be known that this command does not create a rainbow in all conditions. As in real life, the rainbow can only appear after rainfall and opposite of the sun when it is low on the horizon.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
